description: Send NMI/SysRq/Reset to a VM or VMSS Instance.

commands.name: az serial-console send nmi
commands.summary: Send a Non-Maskable Interrupt (NMI) to a VM or VMSS Instance.
examples: az serial-console send nmi -n MyVM -g MyResourceGroup
az serial-console send nmi -n MyVMSS -g MyResourceGroup --instance-id 2

commands.name: az serial-console send reset
commands.summary: Perform a "hard" restart of the VM or VMSS Instance.
examples: az serial-console send reset -n MyVM -g MyResourceGroup
az serial-console send reset -n MyVMSS -g MyResourceGroup --instance-id 2

commands.name: az serial-console send sysrq
commands.summary: Send SysRq sequence to a VM or VMSS Instance.
examples: az serial-console send sysrq -n MyVM -g MyResourceGroup --input c
az serial-console send sysrq -n MyVMSS -g MyResourceGroup --instance-id 2 --input c
